name: Delivery
description: Extracting useful data types for delivery status from the voluminous UPS and FedEx REST API

questions.name: ups_config.user
questions.message: What is the username to your UPS account?

questions.name: ups_config.password
questions.message: What is the password to your UPS account?

questions.name: ups_config.token
questions.message: What is the API token to your UPS account?

questions.message: What is the password to your FedEx account?
